name: Mars Curiosity
description:
Mars: Curiosity is a first-person adventure game where players take the role of the Perseverance rover in their race against time and the elements to recover the Curiosity rover which was lost on the surface of Mars.

The player must navigate the rocky terrain, clear obstacles, and combat high winds and intense gravity in order to find three beacons which will lead you to the location of the fallen Curiosity rover.
